result.reason: VNC clipboard integration relies on the legacy SetClipboardViewer API in FrmMain, which is notoriously unreliable and breaks if the clipboard chain is interrupted by other applications. Upgrading to the modern AddClipboardFormatListener API will ensure consistent clipboard monitoring for VNC.
result.approach: Replace SetClipboardViewer/WM_DRAWCLIPBOARD with AddClipboardFormatListener/WM_CLIPBOARDUPDATE in FrmMain and verify VNC protocol clipboard synchronization logic.
